thread.title: Zayn Malik Has Green Hair Again And I'm So Here For It
thread.title_full: Zayn Malik Has Green Hair Again And I'm So Here For It

author: Julie Gerstein
title: Zayn Malik Has Green Hair Again And I'm So Here For It
text:
View this image ›
Twitter: @zaynmalik What prompted it? Who knows? Mebbe he’s feeling Earth Day. Or he’s really into kale at the moment.
ID: 10787949 3. And yep, fans are definitely feeling it. View this image ›
Twitter: @XTRARADIO ID: 10787973 4. Wigs were reportedly snatched. View this image ›
Twitter: @jordansdiamonds ID: 10787983 5. And lives were changed. View this image ›
Twitter: @kisschattanooga ID: 10788251 6. Of course, this isn’t the first time Zayn’s gone green: He also dyed his hair Kermit-colored in 2015. View this image ›
Instagram: @zayn Oh, that’s him with ex-fiancé Perrie Edwards, nbd.
ID: 10788074 7. And he’s also gone pastel pink in the past. View this image ›
Getty Images Emotio s.
ID: 10788073 8. But the green? It’s a game-changer. View this image ›
Twitter: @malikfrick L VE YOU ZAY BEB.
